title: [ppc64le] test_dim_reduction fails on ppc64le
body_html:
hi , I am seeing the following on ppc64le with GPU.

I think this was due to ATen ReduceOps (#5776) or

FAIL: test_dim_reduction (test_torch.TestTorch)

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/freddie/builder/jenkins/pytorch/pytorch/test/test_torch.py", line 543, in test_dim_reduction
self._test_dim_reduction(self, lambda t: t)
File "/home/freddie/builder/jenkins/pytorch/pytorch/test/test_torch.py", line 444, in _test_dim_reduction
self.assertEqual(x.sum().item(), 16)
File "/home/freddie/builder/jenkins/pytorch/pytorch/test/common.py", line 271, in assertEqual
super(TestCase, self).assertLessEqual(abs(x - y), prec, message)
AssertionError: 1 not less than or equal to 1e-05 :

Ran 1 test in 0.005s

body:
hi ,  I am seeing the following on ppc64le with GPU.

I think this was due to ATen ReduceOps (#5776)   or  

FAIL: test_dim_reduction (test_torch.TestTorch)

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/freddie/builder/jenkins/pytorch/pytorch/test/test_torch.py", line 543, in test_dim_reduction
    self._test_dim_reduction(self, lambda t: t)
  File "/home/freddie/builder/jenkins/pytorch/pytorch/test/test_torch.py", line 444, in _test_dim_reduction
    self.assertEqual(x.sum().item(), 16)
  File "/home/freddie/builder/jenkins/pytorch/pytorch/test/common.py", line 271, in assertEqual
    super(TestCase, self).assertLessEqual(abs(x - y), prec, message)
AssertionError: 1 not less than or equal to 1e-05 :

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 1 test in 0.005s
